extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Atlassian Products and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if any of the Atlassian products in use are affected by the vulnerabilities by checking their versions.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are any Atlassian products affected by the vulnerabilities?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Latest Version of Atlassian Products
extracted_playbook.description: Update all affected Atlassian products to their latest versions to mitigate the vulnerabilities.

affected_products: Confluence Data Center and Server 8 versions before Dec. 5, 2023
Bitbucket Data Center before versions 7.21.21, 8.9.9, 8.13.5, 8.14.4, 8.15.3, 8.16.2 and 8.17.0
Bamboo Data Center and Server before versions 9.2.9, 9.3.6 and 9.4.2
Jira Data Center and Server before versions 9.4.13 and 9.7.0
Jira Service Management Data Center and Server before versions 4.20.30, 5.4.15 and 5.12.2
Crowd Data Center and Server before the version 5.2.2
Confluence Data Center before versions 7.19.18, 8.5.5 and 8.7.2
